name: XWUI Avatar Group Component
description: Group of avatars displayed together with overlap effect. Supports maximum display count with overflow indicator. Uses XWUIAvatar components internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

max.description: Maximum number of avatars to display before showing overflow indicator

size.description: Size of the avatars in the group

spacing.description: Spacing between avatars in pixels (negative values create overlap)

total.description: Total count for overflow indicator (if different from avatars array length)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the avatar group

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

avatars.description: Array of avatar items to display

src.description: Image source URL for the avatar

alt.description: Alternative text for the avatar image

icon.description: Icon to display in the avatar

text.description: Text/initials to display in the avatar
